name: ELIK
description:
NOTE: New Release: (v.1.1)

.Many bugs fixed.
.Performance significantly increased.
.Full compatibility with 32-bit and 64-bit systems.
.Improvements in gameplay and Camera.

SUMMARY

ELIK is a 3D action and adventure game with some RPG elements. Use the power of FIRE and STEAM to defeat your enemies in this dangerous and fun journey !

System Requirements

  • Operating System: XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 3.01Ghz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB (3 GB recommended)
  • Hard Disk: 250 MB of free hard disk space
  • Video: 512 MB Video Card (2Gb Video Card recommended)
  • Other: OpenGL 2.0 or higher (OpenGL 3.0 recommended)
